scripts.cap:build: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.deploy:ios:build: npm run cap:build && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane build
scripts.deploy:ios:beta: npm run cap:build && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane beta
scripts.deploy:ios:release: npm run cap:build && cd ios/App && bundle exec fastlane release
scripts.deploy:android:build: npm run cap:build && cd android && bundle exec fastlane build
scripts.deploy:android:apk: npm run cap:build && cd android && bundle exec fastlane build_apk
scripts.deploy:android:beta: npm run cap:build && cd android && bundle exec fastlane beta
scripts.deploy:android:release: npm run cap:build && cd android && bundle exec fastlane release
